info.author: Lutz Gross
info.description:
escript is a python based environment for implementing mathematical models in
particular those based on coupled, non-linear, time-dependend partial
differential equation. Parallelization with both OpenMP and MPI is supported.
info.keywords: Partial Differential Equations, Finite Elements, PDE, FEM
info.name: escript
info.summary: Solution of Partial Differential Equations (PDE) using Finite Elements (FEM)
info.html_description: escript is a python based environment for implementing mathematical models in particular those based on coupled, non-linear, time-dependend partial differential equation. Parallelization with both OpenMP and MPI is supported.
